mapper.insert: insert into question (question_id, user_id, question_title, question_content, question_regdate, question_add, inquiryType, alertEmail) values(question_id_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{question_title}, #{question_content}, sysdate, #{question_add}, #{inquiryType}, #{alertEmail})
mapper.update: update question set question_status = #{question_status} where question_id=#{question_id}
mapper.delete: delete from question where user_id=#{user_id} and question_id=#{question_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from question where user_id=#{user_id}
